text: Arthur and Lillie is a 1975 American short documentary film directed by Jon H. Else. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. The film is a biographical documentary about Arthur and Lillie Mayer - their own lives and their adventures in the formation of "Hollywood" from its earliest days.Tana Hobart, All Movie Guide ==References== ==External links== *Arthur and Lillie at Pyramid Media * Category:1975 films Category:1975 documentary films Category:1975 short films Category:American films Category:English- language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films Category:Documentary films about Hollywood
title: Arthur and Lillie
